mapper.sql: id, user_name, nick_name, true_name, login_pwd, pay_pwd, user_grade, user_phone, user_mail, user_sex, identity_card, identity_card_validity, identity_issuing, identity_status, user_ky_balance, user_fx_balance, user_dj_balance, tixian_status, user_jf_balance, create_time, option_time, user_status, user_pid, option_remark
mapper.select: select user_name,true_name from ns_user where user_pid in(select id FROM ns_user where user_pid=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}) OR user_pid=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ns_user (id, user_name, nick_name, true_name, login_pwd, pay_pwd, user_grade, user_phone, user_mail, user_sex, identity_card, identity_card_validity, identity_issuing, identity_status, user_ky_balance, user_fx_balance, user_dj_balance, tixian_status, user_jf_balance, create_time, option_time, user_status, user_pid, option_remark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGrade,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identityCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCardValidity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{identityIssuing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userKyBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userFxBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userDjBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tixianStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userJfBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{optionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userPid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{optionRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update ns_user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
true_name = #{trueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_pwd = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_pwd = #{payPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_grade = #{userGrade,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_mail = #{userMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},

identity_status = #{identityStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

user_fx_balance = #{userFxBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
user_dj_balance = #{userDjBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_pid = #{userPid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
option_remark = #{optionRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
